title: Prayer of the Church
verses:
How long, O Lord our Savior, Wilt thou remain a-way?
Our hearts are growing weary Of thy so long de-lay.

O when shall come the moment, When, brighter far than morn,
The sunshine of thy glory Shall on thy people dawn?

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Expresses anticipation for Christ's second coming during the Millerite movement
